title: Castello del Nero to showcase at luxury fair loop
text:
Castello del Nero to showcase at luxury fair loop Castello del Nero to showcase at luxury fair loop Details Category: Hotel   13:45 Lovingly converted from a former 12th Century castle, Castello del Nero Hotel & Spa, is now a 5 star Luxury Hotel and proud member, since opening in 2006, of the Leading Hotels of the World. Castello del Nero Hotel & Spa is located in Tuscany in the heart of the Chianti Wine region, just 30 minutes by car from Florence, Siena and San Gimignano 
Each one of the 50 elegantly restored rooms and Suites, some of them with original frescoes from the 18th Century, is a unique masterpiece furnished with the latest technology and essential comforts. Two Restaurants La Taverna with Tuscan wine & gastronomic flavours and La Torre, 1 Michelin star, offers a distinctive gourmet experience where guests are treated to an attentive service while savouring the excellence of the dishes. The ESPA centre offers customised treatments using the hotels' own extra virgin olive oil, lavender and rosemary. A fitness suite, two tennis courts, and an outdoor heated swimming pool are available for all guests. The hotel also offers a complimentary shuttle service to Florence or Siena (at scheduled times).
